dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 23 PCS: Family and Small Business Taxpayer Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To rescind certain balances made available to the Internal Revenue Service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Family and Small Business Taxpayer Protection Act.

section.header: Rescission of certain balances made available to the Internal Revenue Service
section.text: The unobligated balances of amounts appropriated or otherwise made available for activities of the Internal Revenue Service by paragraphs (1)(A)(ii), (1)(A)(iii), (1)(B), (2), (3), (4), and (5) of section 10301 of Public Law 117â€“169 (commonly known as the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022) as of the date of the enactment of this Act are rescinded.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives January 9, 2023.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
